alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 03 at 7:12PM CST until February 07 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Marengo and Hale Counties. .Flooding is expected on the Black Warrior River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by Friday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT TO MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From late Friday night to Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 90.0 feet, Pasture and wood lands begin to flood. Livestock should be moved to higher ground at stages above 90 feet. At 94.0 feet, Some secondary roads in the area begin to flood. Flooding of farm and pasture lands continues. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Thursday the stage was 80.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Saturday morning to a crest of 92.6 feet Saturday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 90.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
